title: New Orleans Jazz National Historical Park: Directions & Transportation
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation             Directions      New Orleans Jazz National Historical Park Visitor Center  916 N. Peters Street New Orleans, LA 70116 phone: 504-589-4841 (Tue-Sat., 9-5 CST)  To reach our Visitor Center by car: Travel on I-10, heading towards New Orleans. Exit at Orleans Avenue #235A and turn south towards the Vieux Carre (French Quarter). Orleans Avenue turns into Basin Street. Continue on Basin Street and turn left on Conti Street. Turn left on North Peters (last road before the river). Visitor Center is on riverside of street, past Cafe DuMonde, underneath Galvez Restaurant. Old U.S. Mint 400 Esplanade Avenue New Orleans, LA  70116 (504) 589-2266  (Tue - Sat. closed Fridays) The Old U.S. Mint is located at 400 Esplanade Avenue, 4 blocks from the visitor center at the corner of Esplanade and Decatur. Perseverance Hall Located in Louis Armstrong Park (504) 589-2293 (Open for Special Events)   Regional airport servicing New Orleans is the Louis Armstrong International Airport (MSY).
